alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Lancaster; Lebanon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 04 at 4:22AM EST until March 04 at 4:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts of 45 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Dauphin, Lebanon and Lancaster Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Travel will be difficult at times, especially for high profile vehicles on north, south roads where cross winds will be the strongest.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. For high wind safety information, visit weather.gov/wind. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.
